cause.description:
1. I aim to spread peace and love through out the world. 2. I aim to get people from all around the world to join this cause. 3. I aim to end world hunger (I wish)
1. The world must band together
2. There must be peace in the world
3. There must be love throughout the world
cause.mission: To spread thepeace & love around the world
cause.name: Pagan's for Peace!
